channel.title: productivity on Sting's Note
channel.description: Recent content in productivity on Sting's Note

item.title: Switch to obsidian
item.description: I used to use bear as my note taking app. However, as the roam reseach began to get popular, I switched to org-roam, a great emacs extension. It is base on org mode, so the edit feature is really powerful. However, it is still an editor, not an delicated note app. Some features are not easy to use. For example, seaching or just skiming some notes. The graphing feature of roam research is also needing improving.
